channel.title: Gluon Gun Visual Glitch (No, not the gib effect)
channel.description: Found this by mistake while mucking about with host_timescale. Start firing the gluon gun, then zoom in - the beam will still be firing, though it doesn't do any damage. If you let go of the attack button while zoomed in, and zoom out again, the beam will still be firing. It doesn't drain ammo or do any damage to enemies, but the effects and sounds are still there.

item.title: Gluon Gun Visual Glitch (No, not the gib effect)
item.dc:creator: KyuuGryphon
item.description:
Found this by mistake while mucking about with host_timescale. Start firing the gluon gun, then zoom in - the beam will still be firing, though it doesn’t do any damage. If you let go of the attack button while zoomed in, and zoom out again, the beam will still be firing. It doesn’t drain ammo or do any damage to enemies, but the effects and sounds are still there.
